languages.text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
Masters of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the Grand Strategist is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

languages.text:
Als Meister der eigenen Positionierung auf dem Schlachtfeld und jener seiner Verbündeten kann der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} die Kampfkraft seiner Gruppe erhöhen, indem er wichtige Teile des Schlachtfelds zuweist und verstärkt.
Hauptfokus: Kontrolle über das Schlachtfeld, Verbündeten-Buffs, einzigartiger Vorteil, feindliche Debuffs.
languages.original_text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
Als Meister der eigenen Positionierung auf dem Schlachtfeld und jener seiner Verbündeten kann der Großstratege die Kampfkraft seiner Gruppe erhöhen, indem er wichtige Teile des Schlachtfelds zuweist und verstärkt.
Hauptfokus: Kontrolle über das Schlachtfeld, Verbündeten-Buffs, einzigartiger Vorteil, feindliche Debuffs.

languages.text:
Великие {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратеги{/g} точно знают, какие позиции на поле боя лучше занять им и их союзникам. Выделение и усиление специальных зон позволяет значительно повысить эффективность отряда.
Ключевые особенности: контроль над полем боя, положительные эффекты для союзников, уникальные вспомогательные средства, отрицательные эффекты для противников.
languages.original_text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
Стратеги точно знают, какие позиции на поле боя лучше занять им и их союзникам. Выделение и усиление специальных зон позволяет значительно повысить эффективность отряда.
Ключевые особенности: контроль над полем боя, положительные эффекты для союзников, уникальные вспомогательные средства, отрицательные эффекты для противников.

languages.text:
Expert en positionnement lors des combats, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} est capable d'améliorer l'efficacité de ses alliés en indiquant et renforçant différentes zones critiques du champ de bataille.
Points forts : contrôle du champ de bataille, bonus pour les alliés, soutien exclusif, malus infligés aux adversaires
languages.original_text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
Expert en positionnement lors des combats, le Stratège est capable d’améliorer l’efficacité de ses alliés en indiquant et renforçant différentes zones critiques du champ de bataille.
Points forts : contrôle du champ de bataille, bonus pour les alliés, soutien exclusif, debuffs pour adversaires

languages.text:
Un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} domina el posicionamiento, tanto propio como de sus aliados, y puede maximizar la eficacia en combate del grupo designando y reforzando las zonas esenciales del campo de batalla.
Especialidades: control del campo de batalla, potenciar a aliados, debilitar a enemigos, función única.
languages.original_text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
Un gran estratega domina el posicionamiento, tanto propio como de sus aliados, y puede maximizar la eficacia en combate del grupo designando y reforzando las zonas esenciales del campo de batalla.
Especialidades: control del campo de batalla, potenciar a aliados, debilitar a enemigos, función única.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}是战场上的指挥大师，可以指定战场上的特定区域，为该区域提供加成效果，提高自己与盟友的战斗能力。
核心：战场控制，强化盟友，独特能力，削弱敌人。
languages.original_text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}是战场上的指挥大师，可以指定战场上的特定区域，为该区域提供加成效果，提高自己与盟友的战斗能力。
核心：战场控制，强化盟友，独特能力，削弱敌人。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は、自身と味方の戦場での位置取りの達人。戦場の重要なポジションを決め強化することで、部隊の戦闘効果を増加すことが可能。
コアフォーカス：戦場の制御、味方バフ、ユニークユーティリティ、敵デバフ。
languages.original_text:
A master of battlefield positioning for themselves and their allies, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} is able to increase the battle effectiveness of their party by designating and strengthening important parts of the battlefield.
Core focus: battlefield control, ally buffs, unique utility, enemy debuffs.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は、自身と味方の戦場での位置取りの達人。戦場の重要なポジションを決め強化することで、部隊の戦闘効果を増加すことが可能。
コアフォーカス：戦場の制御、味方バフ、ユニークユーティリティ、敵デバフ。

languages.text:
Hem kendisinin hem de dostlarının çatışma alanında konuşlandırılmasında usta olan {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g}, çatışma alanının önemli bölgelerini saptayıp güçlendirerek partisinin çatışmadaki etkinliğini artırabilmektedir.
Güçlü yönleri: Çatışma alanı kontrolü, dost birimler için olumlu etkiler, eşsiz destekler, düşmanlar için olumsuz etkiler.
